properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ekaristia ni chakula,
chakula cha uzima wa milele.
Ee mkate wa Mbinguni,
shibisha roho zetu. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Yesu Mwokozi kashuka
chini kwetu tukampokee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Maumbo haya ni mwili
wake Yesu twakiri sote.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Yesu mpenzi pokea
moyo wangu na mimi wako.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Ninakupenda kuliko nafsi
yangu Mwokozi wangu.
